title: When a lottery 'wins' sick babies life-saving drugs
description: The company behind a gene therapy for muscle-wasting disease SMA will give out 100 doses via lottery.

title: Your pictures on the theme of 'electric'
description: Each week, we publish a gallery of readers' pictures on a set theme. This week it is "electric".

title: Shane Fitzsimmons: 'Tireless' fire chief steering Australians through disaster
description: Fire chief Shane Fitzsimmons has worked tirelessly and "masterfully" to save lives, close observers say.

title: Inaccessible first-floor Wisbech property for sale for £100
description: You cannot get in to the bricked-up first-floor room - but you can buy it for £100 if you want it.

description: Wing Cdr Paul Farnes was the last surviving "ace pilot" and died at his home in Hampshire.

title: UK interest rates kept on hold at 0.75%
description: In Mark Carney's final meeting as Bank of England governor, policymakers vote 7-2 to keep rates unchanged.

title: 'Bald' hedgehog returns to wild after re-growing spines
description: The animal weighed just 324g and was missing its fur and most of its spines when it was found in Comrie.

title: North at centre for Wales against Italy with debutant McNicholl on wing
description: George North starts at centre in Wales' Six Nations opener against Italy, with uncapped Johnny McNicholl taking his place on the wing.

description: The death toll now stands at 170, with more than 7,700 cases confirmed in China.

description: Consumer goods giant Unilever says traditional tea sales are slowing as consumers change their habits.

description: Figures show a rise in prison officers in England and Wales suffering from mental health problems.
